name: @briebug/jest-schematic
description: Schematic to add jest to an Angular CLI project

scripts.clean: git checkout HEAD -- sandbox && git clean -f -d sandbox
scripts.build:clean:launch: yarn build && yarn clean && yarn launch
scripts.launch: yarn link:sandbox && cd sandbox && yarn && ./node_modules/.bin/ng g @briebug/jest-schematic:jest
scripts.test: yarn build:clean:launch && yarn test:sandbox && yarn clean
scripts.test:sandbox: cd sandbox && yarn lint && yarn test --no-cache && yarn build
scripts.link:sandbox: yarn link && cd sandbox && yarn link @briebug/jest-schematic
scripts.debug:
echo "debug not setup with @angular/schematics
> node --inspect-brk $(which schematics) .:addJest"

author: Briebug
